name: 2009 Edicion Limitada Excepcionales
additionalNotes:
Boasting the world’s first Ometepe binder, La Escepción is handcrafted in Honduras with a unique blend of proprietary Nicaraguan tobaccos.  Enveloped in lustrous Honduran Habano Talanga, this medium-bodied collection offers a modern take on the brand, with an intriguingly rich, bold flavor and model construction that is evident at the first glance.

http://www.puff.com/Content/Cigar-News/new-cigars-from-the-ipcpr-show/LA-ESCEPCION.html
